features: 【Large Capacity Knife Block】The knife holder holds up to 14 knives, extra slot to store kitchen scissors. Spaced slots separate the knife blades to prevent scratching and keep the knife sharp. Not only does it not take up too much countertop space, but it keeps your kitchen counter organized.

【Easy Cleaning Knife Holder】Detachable design allows you to easily clean this knife block organizer. Drain hole prevents rust and easy to dry. The widen bottom keeps the knife block from tipping over. The anti-slip feature ensures stability when handling the knives.

【High-Quality Knife Organizer】This knife stand holder is made of stainless steel, sturdy and durable. It can use a long time, not easy to damage. The modern design matches a variety of kitchen decor styles. You can reach the knives easily when you need.

【Universal Knife Storage】Because of the slot-less design, all blade shapes and sizes up to 8” fit easily anywhere inside the knife holder. It is ideal for paring knives, steak knives, chef knives, utility knives, and more! Plus, the knife storage includes a slot for a kitchen scissors.

【Lifetime Service】This kitchen knife holder is still a great gift for friends and family who love cooking. We provide 18 months quality assurance and friendly customer service for our products. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us. We will be glad to serve you to the best of our ability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice design, well made
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a vertical kitchen knife and scissor holder. I am happy to get this one. I like the design and the quality of the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This holder takes up less room than the old wood block style. It looks good on the countertop and keeps the knives handier than digging through a drawer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Extra knife holder
reviews.reviewText: This works great as an extra knife holder. We have a wood block that came with a set, but have some extra knives laying around and my wife has since bought some nicer chef knives. This gives us a place to put these extra knives without leaving them in drawers or having to buy extra knife sheaths. This is a little light, which makes the top top heavy when it's full of knives, and this does not hold knives where the handle is longer or heavier than the cutting edge. We have a couple of paring knives where the blade is short but the handle is just as large and heavy as the rest of the set, so when the knife portion is put into this holder, the weight of the handle causes the knife to topple over and there's no friction holding the knife portion in, which can be dangerous. This is primarily best for longer knives. Extra scissor slot is a nice benefit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Knives will not sit neatly
reviews.reviewText: I sent it back because my steak knives, or any of my knives really, would not sit in it nicely and instead hung at an angle since the slots were too wide. I sent it back and got a magnetic strip to mount on the wall instead.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I like everything about this product! It looks great too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect size, well made
reviews.reviewText: Looks expensive but very reasonable Perfect size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Needed extra storage for my husbands grilling knifes and this worked perfectly. The material overall is decent and the bottom comes off so you can clean the casing better and air out the knifes when washing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very flexible in what it can hold.
reviews.reviewText: My wife has been complaining about her drawer full of knives and asked me to see if I could find something to hold most of them. She really likes wooden knife blocks, but they're not very adaptable. When I saw this holder, it looked like what she needs.She has a number of oddly shaped knives, in addition to a meat fork and her scissors, two things she hadn't even thought of. But this knife holder holds everything except one of her knives that has a heavier handle than blade. She's really pleased, and it's easy to wash, too.
